title: 30. You created a cluster.YAML file containing : resources: – name: cluster type: container.vl.cluster properties: zone: europe-west1-b cluster: 2 description: “My GCP ACE cluster” # initialNodeCount: 2 You want to use Cloud Deployment Manager to create this cluster in GKE. What should you do?
alternatives: A. gcloud deployment-manager deployments create my-gcp-ace-cluster –config cluster.yaml
B. gcloud deployment-manager deployments apply my-gcp-ace-cluster_-type container.v1.duster–config cluster.yaml
C. gcloud deployment-manager deployments apply my-gcp-oce-cluster–config cluster.yaml
D. gcloud deployment-manager deployments create my-gcp-ace-cluster–type container.v1.cluster–config cluster.yaml
